edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter
Class OrientationFilter

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter.OrientationFilter

public class OrientationFilter
extends Object

Does sensor fusion of accelerometer, magnetometer, and gyroscope data to derive an orientation estimate

Author:
Nisarg
